page.description: When accessing a Microsoft Access database, Alpha Anywhere may display an error message, "Can't Load ODBCJI32.dll Error". To fix this error, install or repair the Microsoft Access Database Engine.

discussion.p: If you have installed Office 365 on your computer, you may find you can no longer connect to a Microsoft Access database.
To fix the error, install the Microsoft Access Database Engine.
[Click here] to download the Microsoft Access Database Engine installer from Microsoft's website.

If Microsoft Access Database Engine is alerady installed, running a 'Repair' on the engine should fix the problem. A 'Repair' can be run through the uninstall or change a program interface for Programs and Features from the Windows Control Panel for the Microsoft Access Database Engine program.
